step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.NODE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDNODE_MESH M, (SELECT NODE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDNODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]) N WHERE N.NODE_PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.NODE_PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK_MESH P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE (PID)
(SELECT DISTINCT (P.FACE_PID) FROM CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK L, TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE N WHERE L.S_NODE_PID = N.PID UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK L, TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE N WHERE L.E_NODE_PID = N.PID) X WHERE P.LINK_PID = X.LINK_PID));

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT FT.FACE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK_MESH M, TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK N WHERE N.PID = M.LINK_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) T, CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO FT WHERE T.PID = FT.LINK_PID );
DELETE FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE P, CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO P, CMG_BUILDFACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.FACE_PID AND R.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO P, CMG_BUILDFACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.FACE_PID AND SDO_ANYINTERACT(R.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.FACE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDFACE T WHERE T.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.FACE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDFACE T WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(T.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
DELETE FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDING (PID) SELECT DISTINCT B.BUILDING_PID FROM CMG_BUILDFACE B, TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE T WHERE B.FACE_PID = T.PID AND B.BUILDING_PID !=0 AND B.BUILDING_PID !=-1;

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK P, TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK P, TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM CMG_BUILDFACE P,TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO P,TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDFACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDFACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDING P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDING T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDING_3DICON P WHERE P.BUILDING_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDING T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDING_3DMODEL P WHERE P.BUILDING_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDING T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDING_NAME P WHERE P.BUILDING_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDING T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDING_POI P WHERE P.BUILDING_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDING T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDLINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDLINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDNODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDNODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE T );
DELETE FROM CMG_BUILDFACE_TENANT P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDFACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDFACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CMG_BUILDFACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDING SELECT PID FROM CMG_BUILDING A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CMG_BUILDING B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDLINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM CMG_BUILDLINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CMG_BUILDLINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CMG_BUILDNODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM CMG_BUILDNODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CMG_BUILDNODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE (PID) (SELECT NODE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.NODE_PID FROM CM_BUILDNODE_MESH M, (SELECT NODE_PID FROM CM_BUILDNODE_MESH WHERE MESH_ID [mesh]) N WHERE N.NODE_PID = M.NODE_PID GROUP BY N.NODE_PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK_MESH P WHERE P.MESH_ID [mesh]);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE (PID)
(SELECT DISTINCT (P.FACE_PID) FROM CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO P WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK L, TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE N WHERE L.S_NODE_PID = N.PID UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK L, TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE N WHERE L.E_NODE_PID = N.PID) X WHERE P.LINK_PID = X.LINK_PID));

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE (PID) ( SELECT DISTINCT FT.FACE_PID FROM (SELECT COUNT(1), N.PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK_MESH M, TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK N WHERE N.PID = M.LINK_PID GROUP BY N.PID HAVING COUNT(1) > 1) T, CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO FT WHERE T.PID = FT.LINK_PID );
DELETE FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT T.LINK_PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE P, CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO T WHERE P.PID = T.FACE_PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK L WHERE L.S_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE) UNION ALL SELECT L.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK L WHERE L.E_NODE_PID IN (SELECT PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE) );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO P, CM_BUILDFACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.FACE_PID AND R.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO P, CM_BUILDFACE R WHERE P.FACE_PID = R.FACE_PID AND SDO_ANYINTERACT(R.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK (PID) (SELECT P.LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY,[area]) = 'TRUE');
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDING (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.BUILDING_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE T WHERE T.MESH_ID [mesh] AND T.BUILDING_PID !=0 AND T.BUILDING_PID !=-1);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDING (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.BUILDING_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE T WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(T.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE' AND T.BUILDING_PID !=0 AND T.BUILDING_PID !=-1);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.FACE_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE T WHERE T.MESH_ID [mesh]);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT T.FACE_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE T WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(T.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE');
DELETE FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);

INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE (PID) (SELECT P.S_NODE_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK P, TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION SELECT P.E_NODE_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK P, TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDFACE P,TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE T WHERE P.FACE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDFACE P WHERE SDO_ANYINTERACT(P.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE';
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO P, CM_BUILDFACE F WHERE P.FACE_PID=F.FACE_PID AND F.MESH_ID [mesh];
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO P, CM_BUILDFACE F WHERE P.FACE_PID=F.FACE_PID AND SDO_ANYINTERACT(F.GEOMETRY, [area]) = 'TRUE';
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDLINK P,TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDLINK_MESH P,TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDNODE P,TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM CM_BUILDNODE_MESH P,TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE T WHERE P.NODE_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDFACE P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE T );
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDFACE_TOPO P WHERE P.FACE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE T );
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDING P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDING T );
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDLINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK T );
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDLINK_MESH P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK T );
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDNODE P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE T );
DELETE FROM CM_BUILDNODE_MESH P WHERE P.NODE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDFACE SELECT FACE_PID FROM CM_BUILDFACE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CM_BUILDFACE B WHERE A.FACE_PID = B.FACE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDING SELECT PID FROM CM_BUILDING A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CM_BUILDING B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDLINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM CM_BUILDLINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CM_BUILDLINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_CM_BUILDNODE SELECT NODE_PID FROM CM_BUILDNODE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM CM_BUILDNODE B WHERE A.NODE_PID = B.NODE_PID);
